name: American Air Flight Training
about: American Air Flight Training, located at DeKalb-Peachtree Airport in Atlanta, offers personalized and comprehensive flight instruction. Led by Steve Shaner, with over 49 years of experience and 32 years as an FAA-Designated Pilot Examiner, the school provides one-on-one training tailored to each student's learning style. Students train in modern, well-maintained Piper Archer LX aircraft with G1000 NXi Glass Cockpits and enjoy state-of-the-art training facilities, including comfortable classrooms and high-definition video recording of flight lessons. The program exceeds FAA certification standards, ensuring graduates are among the safest and most confident pilots. With a focus on individual attention and safety, American Air Flight Training delivers a superior learning environment for aspiring pilots.
